overview:
Ranah Edelin is Co-Founder and CEO of Embly. Embly is a mobile and web social commerce startup based in San Francisco. Embly’s proprietary Thoughtfulness Engine sorts through a wealth of social data to surface the interesting and important moments in your friends’ lives and helps you recognize them with spontaneous and relevant retailer gifts and other actions.

Ranah was also Co-Founder and CEO of SingShot Media, an online karaoke service that EA acquired in 2007. He was also part of the founding team of the award-winning Rhapsody music service, specifically serving as the VP of Business Development, Corporate Development, and International at Listen.com (acquired by RealNetworks).

Ranah has also been a VP at EA as well as the COO at Raptr, a social network for gamers with over 15 million users.

Ranah has an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business and a BA from Brown University. He also received a Japanese government scholarship to study at Nagoya University and is a Japanese language speaker.

image.attribution: NY Games Conference

relationships.title: VP of Business Development, Corporate Development, and International
